name: tty-typesetter
description: terminal typesetting with real world measurements of character advance widths

scripts.build: rm -rf build || true; rollup --config rollup.config.mjs && chmod +x build/bin.mjs && cp README.md LICENSE src/index.d.ts build && grep -v private < package.json > build/package.json && cd build && npm pack && cd - && mv build/*.tgz package.tgz
scripts.dopublish: npm run build --silent && npm publish package.tgz

author: David Evans
